verses.verse: And it came to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had given him <S%H5117>rest<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> from all his <S%H341>enemies<s%>;

That the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%> now, I <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>, but the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3427>dwelleth<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> <S%H3407>curtains<s%>.
And <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H6213>do<s%> all that is in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is with thee.
¶ And it came to pass that <S%H3915>night<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3212>Go<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, Shalt thou <S%H1129>build<s%> me an <S%H1004>house<s%> for me to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>?

Whereas I have not <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in any <S%H1004>house<s%> since the <S%H3117>time<s%> that I brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, even to this <S%H3117>day<s%>, but have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in a <S%H168>tent<s%> and in a <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>.

In all the places wherein I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> with all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> I a <S%H1697>word<s%> with <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why <S%H1129>build<s%> ye not me an <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%>?

Now therefore so shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, I <S%H3947>took<s%> thee from the <S%H5116>sheepcote<s%>, from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, to be <S%H5057>ruler<s%> over my <S%H5971>people<s%>, over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

And I was with thee whithersoever thou <S%H1980>wentest<s%>, and have cut <S%H3772>off<s%> all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%> out of thy <S%H6440>sight<s%>, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8034>name<s%>, like unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> men that are in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H7760>appoint<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them, that they may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in a place of their own, and <S%H7264>move<s%> no more; neither shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5766>wickedness<s%> <S%H6031>afflict<s%> them any <S%H3254>more<s%>, as <S%H7223>beforetime<s%>,

And as since the <S%H3117>time<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8199>judges<s%> to be over my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and have caused thee to <S%H5117>rest<s%> from all thine <S%H341>enemies<s%>. Also the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5046>telleth<s%> thee that he will <S%H6213>make<s%> thee an <S%H1004>house<s%>.

¶ And when thy <S%H3117>days<s%> be <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H7901>sleep<s%> with thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, I will set <S%H6965>up<s%> thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee, which shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> out of thy <S%H4578>bowels<s%>, and I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>.
He shall <S%H1129>build<s%> an <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, and I will <S%H3559>stablish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>, and he shall be my <S%H1121>son<s%>. If he commit <S%H5753>iniquity<s%>, I will <S%H3198>chasten<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%>, and with the <S%H5061>stripes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>:
But my <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall not depart <S%H5493>away<s%> from him, as I <S%H5493>took<s%> it from <S%H7586>Saul<s%>, whom I put <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.

And thine <S%H1004>house<s%> and thy <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H539>established<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: thy <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
According to all these <S%H1697>words<s%>, and according to all this <S%H2384>vision<s%>, so did <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> in, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%>, Who am I, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>? and what is my <S%H1004>house<s%>, that thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> me <S%H1988>hitherto<s%>?

And this was yet a small <S%H6994>thing<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; but thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> also of thy <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> for a great while to <S%H7350>come<s%>. And is this the <S%H8452>manner<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>?
And what <S%H3254>can<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>say<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> unto thee? for thou, <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, <S%H3045>knowest<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>.

For thy <S%H1697>word's<s%> sake, and according to thine own <S%H3820>heart<s%>, hast thou <S%H6213>done<s%> all these great <S%H1420>things<s%>, to make thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> them.

Wherefore thou art <S%H1431>great<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>: for there is none like thee, neither is there any <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> thee, according to all that we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> with our <S%H241>ears<s%>.

And what <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> is like thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, even like <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, whom <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H6299>redeem<s%> for a <S%H5971>people<s%> to himself, and to <S%H7760>make<s%> him a <S%H8034>name<s%>, and to <S%H6213>do<s%> for you great <S%H1420>things<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%>, for thy <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H6440>before<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, which thou <S%H6299>redeemedst<s%> to thee from <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and their <S%H430>gods<s%>?

For thou hast <S%H3559>confirmed<s%> to thyself thy <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> unto thee <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>: and thou, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, art <S%H1961>become<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And now, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, the <S%H1697>word<s%> that thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and concerning his <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H6965>establish<s%> it <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> as thou hast <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And let thy <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.

For thou, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, hast <S%H1540%H241>revealed<s%> to thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will <S%H1129>build<s%> thee an <S%H1004>house<s%>: therefore hath thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%> this <S%H8605>prayer<s%> unto thee.

And now, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, thou art that <S%H430>God<s%>, and thy <S%H1697>words<s%> be <S%H571>true<s%>, and thou hast <S%H1696>promised<s%> this <S%H2896>goodness<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>:

Therefore now let it <S%H2974>please<s%> thee to <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that it may continue for <S%H5769>ever<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: for thou, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it: and with thy <S%H1293>blessing<s%> let the <S%H1004>house<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>.
